reviewText: Everyone should be so lucky to have a teacher like this M. Lopez. He surely touched the lives of so many children in this 1-room school in the countryside of France.  I hope you will add this to you collection. Cheers!.
If you want to see what a perfect teacher is like, watch this movie. Sensitive and beautiful movie. Recommend.

This is a very beautiful story about a one room school in France.  Sensitive filming is done of teaching and counseling students. The extras after give more info about the teacher and the school. Subtitles are available if needed. Very well done.
